meanings.sent1: The last day of school is tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I saw you last week at the park.
meanings.sent3: The last cookie in the jar always disappears mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: Her last words to me were filled with kindness.
meanings.sent5: The last train home is always crowded.

meanings.sent1: This is the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent2: He made the last shot and won the game.
meanings.sent3: The last slice of pizza is mine, no arguments!
meanings.sent4: The last chapter of the book revealed the biggest plot twist.
meanings.sent5: The last resort is to call for help.

meanings.definition: The lowest in rank or importance
meanings.sent1: He was the last to be picked for the team.
meanings.sent2: The last in line gets the smallest piece of cake.
meanings.sent3: Being the last in the class doesn't mean you're not smart.
meanings.sent4: The last on the list is often forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The last to arrive has to sit in the back.

meanings.definition: To continue in time or existence
meanings.sent1: I hope this friendship will last forever.
meanings.sent2: Will the memories of our trip last a lifetime?
meanings.sent3: The magic of the moment seemed to last an eternity.
meanings.sent4: Their love will last through any storm.
meanings.sent5: The impact of his words will last in my heart.

meanings.definition: The final item in a list or series
meanings.sent1: Make sure to check off the last item on the list.
meanings.sent2: The last on the menu is always the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The last in the lineup is the grand finale.
meanings.sent4: The last in the collection is the rarest gem.
meanings.sent5: The last in the series leaves you wanting more.
